1'a1(mdo sde): mang+ya \u0f89\u0fa4ga la sulas pa'i gras rnam
1'a2(mdo sde): yAn su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
1'a3(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa shes bya ba rig pa yin pa'i mang / ba khor
1'b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
1'b2(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i
1'b3(mdo sde): tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan pa rnams kyi gnas/
1'b4(mdo sde): gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas/ mtshan
2a1(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas
2a2(mdo sde): na'adi lta ste/ dge slong 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu
2a3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ thams cad sgra bskyangs pa/ dben pa la gnas pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog
2a4(mdo sde): la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang du yang dag
2b1(mdo sde): 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
2b2(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang /
2b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan
2b4(mdo sde): pa bskul byed chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlung
2b5(mdo sde): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan
3a1(mdo sde): pa ci 'jig dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sras dang / tshe dang ldan pa mis byin gyi bu dang / tshe dang
3a2(mdo sde): ldan pa zang la gnas dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo ki la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / de dag dang gzhan yang
3a3(mdo sde): dbang dang ldan pa lnga brgya tham pa/ bye 'bred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan
3a4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
3a5(mdo sde): 'khod do// yang de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa lhas
3b1(mdo sde): mchod dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags 'dod dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' sde dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' 'dod dang / de dag dang
3b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang dge slong lnga brgya tham pa lam du zhugs pa las/ dbyar gnyen yod na gnas nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya
3b3(mdo sde): ka lan ta ka gnas pa gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
3b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa de dang 'dra ba'i
3b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' stong dang lhan cig tu yul tsam par dbyar gnas nas/ lam du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya
3b6(mdo sde): ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
4a1(mdo sde): mgos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
4a2(mdo sde): chen po bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / phug sbas dang / mis byin dang / dbang pos byin dang /
4a3(mdo sde): chu lha dang / tshangs lha dang stobs bzang dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / mthong ba don yod dang / legs par yang
4a4(mdo sde): dag zhugs dang / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang / rtag tu brtson dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / 'gro ba
4a5(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi 'dzin dang / blo gros rab gnas dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / 'jig
4a6(mdo sde): rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / dpag med pa rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par
4a7(mdo sde): gnon dang / don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / spobs pa chen po dang / spobs
4b1(mdo sde): pa rnon po dang / spobs pa zab pa dang / spobs pa mtha' yas dang / spobs pa dpag med dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / pad+ma dpal gyi snying po dang / chos
4b2(mdo sde): 'phags dang / lag na rin chen dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / bskal pa 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha bsgos pa dang / bud med 'gyur ba'i go cha bsgos pa dang / skyes par
4b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i go cha bsgos pa dang / sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha bsgos pa dang / mtha' yas khyu mchog dang / dpag mI khyu mchog dang / dmigs pa thams cad rnam par
4b4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang / tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa sha stag ste/ yul tha dad pa
4b5(mdo sde): rnams dbyar gnas nas yul rgyu zhing gcig tu 'dus te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags na
4b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dus par
4b7(mdo sde): thugs su chud nas/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa/ dge slong
4b8(mdo sde): dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bskur
5a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir 'od ma'i chal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
5a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus
5a3(mdo sde): 'phags po'i ri la dbang po'i brag phug na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ cog pu pa/
5a4(mdo sde): rtsa'i gding ba pa/ shing drung pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa pa/ 'chang ba sha stag deng lhan cig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul
5a5(mdo sde): ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dge slong lnga brgya tham pa de dag dang lhan cig tu lus 'phags ra'i dbang po'i brag phug nas mi snang
5a6(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na 'dug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das
5a7(mdo sde): kyi tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs te/ gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
5a8(mdo sde): gnas brtan chen po 'od srung chen po 'ong ba 'di ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ chos gos pa 'chang ba bas mtha'i gnas
5b1(mdo sde): mal na gnas pa 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pa/ ma 'dres pa'i chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos
5b2(mdo sde): ji snyed pa ni dge slong dag da ltar/ dge slong 'od srung chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag dang mtshungs pa 'dra ba ni/ ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // dge slong
5b3(mdo sde): slong 'od srung chos gos gsum pa ni lha rnams dang yang smra ba dang / kun tu smra bar mi 'dod na/ mi rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
5b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung tshur shog/ 'od srung khyed legs par 'ongs so// kye ma gnas
5b5(mdo sde): bstan 'od srung gi 'di lta ste/ 'dir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas so// 'od srung khyod gdan 'di'i phyed kha 'dug shig ces/ bcom ldan 'dra
5b6(mdo sde): kyis gnas bstan 'od srung la gdan gyi phyed glanang ma thag tu de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bskyod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas 'di 'gul
5b7(mdo sde): rab tu 'gul// kun tu rab tu 'gul// g.yos rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar
5b8(mdo sde): gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas 'di ni 'di lta ste// dper na yul ma ga da'i khar ba'i snod la lcags kyi thug lum gyis bsnun na/ 'ur 'ur zer ba
6a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du btsun pa 'od srung chen po la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdam
6a2(mdo sde): las bskyod nas de nam de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khaMs 'di sgra skad chen po 'dzin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chos gos phrag
6a3(mdo sde): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar bar btud nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi thang
6a4(mdo sde): du byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyin bas lams zos gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gamapa to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa las
6a5(mdo sde): bdag ni nyan thos lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gos sam/ lhung bzed dam/
6a6(mdo sde): gdan nam de las gzhan pa'i long spyod rnams nyan thos rnaMs kyis longs spyad par rngo mi thogs lag so// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lha dang mi
6a7(mdo sde): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa lags shing / bcom ldan 'das las/ bcom ldan 'das sha ni ra swa phyag dar khrod gang dag blangs
6a8(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod rten gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ de dag bdag gis ma spyad pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de 'dod pa'i rnam par brtag
6b1(mdo sde): pa 'am// gnod ses kyi rnam par rtog pa 'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam pa rtog pa'i rnam par rtags pa 'am/ 'dod chags kyis yongasu gdungs par gyur pa 'am/ zhe sdang
6b2(mdo sde): gyi yongasu gdung ba dang / gti mug gi yongasu gdung pas yongasu gdungs par ma dran lag so// bcom ldan 'das mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis/ bcom ldan
6b3(mdo sde): 'das la sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mnos pa rnaMs mi slob pa'i sa la thug gi bar du spyi bos mnos lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi longs spyad pa sla du blangs
6b4(mdo sde): pa ni ma lags kyi/ gdam pa dang rjesu bstan pa las/ brtsams nas blangs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de dag blangs nas/ sems mtho ba 'am dma' bar gyur par
6b5(mdo sde): mi dran lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos gos ma mchis pa'i lus la sbyar bar mi dran lag so// bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod de dag
6b6(mdo sde): sug pa ma ser pas reg par mi dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mnos pa
6b7(mdo sde): rnaMs mi slob pa'i sa la thug gi bar du spyi bos mnos lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis longs spyad pa slad du// blangs pa ni ma lags kyi// ga dam pa dang
6b8(mdo sde): rjesu bstan pa las// brtsams nas blangs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de dag blangs nas// sems mtho ba 'am dma' bar gyur par mi dran lags so//
7a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos gos mchis pa'i lus la sbyar bar mi dran lag so// /
7a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod de dag sug pa ma ser pas reg par mi dran lags bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang du 'chi ba de dang der sha na'i ras phyag khrod de
7a3(mdo sde): dag mgos phyag 'tshal cing ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag yan lag ma btsang ba gang gis kyang reg par mi
7a4(mdo sde): dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag bcangs leg so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bcom ldan
7a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis spangs shing gnang ba lags te/ de dag ni bdag gis bcangs lagaso// sangs rgyas rje su dran pa ma lags par de las bzhin snyoms
7a6(mdo sde): par 'jug pa de dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par mi dran lags so// bdag ji ltar gnas pa nas sa la sa'i 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / chu la
7a7(mdo sde): chu'i 'du shes dang / mel me'i 'du shes dang / rlung la rlung gi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pha rol
7a8(mdo sde): gyi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang ba dang / thos pa dang bye brag shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyis rjesu
7b1(mdo sde): brtags pa dang / rje su bsams pa de dag la yang bdag 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa de 'du shes
7b2(mdo sde): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pas yang dag par 'da'
7b3(mdo sde): ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes kyi gnas pa de 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / 'du shes thams cad yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa de yang slob
7b4(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa dang / mi slob pa'i gnas par dag gis yang dag par rje su ma mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das sa gnas pa de la de bzhin pa yang dag pa
7b5(mdo sde): rje su mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong lags te/ bdag cag gis so// btso
7b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ na mkha' bla gab ma mchis pa la ming dang brda' dang gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ming dang
7b7(mdo sde): brda' dang / gdags gang na mkha' zhes tha snyad du gtags pa dang / na mkha' zhes brdar brtags pa dang / na mkha' zhes rten du bgyis pa dang /
7b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ba zhes 'am// bla gab ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ stong pa zhe 'am/ gsog ce'am gsol ba ces 'am/ ya ma rA zhe'o/
8a1(mdo sde): gzung ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am tshad ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ rten ma mchis pa zhe'am/ blang ba ma mchis
8a2(mdo sde): pa zhes 'am/ dor ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ lus ma mchis pa zhe'am ji lta ba bzhin du gang yong su dag pa zhes 'am/ bar snang ni
8a3(mdo sde): 'am thogs pa ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang gzhan yang tha snyad kyi
8a4(mdo sde): brda' tha dad brnam pa sna tshogs kyi brjod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ tshad
8a5(mdo sde): 'di tsam 'am yongs su bcang ba'adi tsam 'am// / mnyam pa 'am mi
8a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa zhes ming 'amabarda' 'am brten rnas kyis 'tshal bar
8a7(mdo sde): mi nu lags so// // / bcom ldan 'das gang dag
8b1(mdo sde): de'i phyag tsam zhig 'tshal ba thams cad kyis kyang // kha dog
8b2(mdo sde): 'am dbyibs sam// dgom pas na mkha' tshad 'di tsam dang mchog 'di tsam
8b3(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba ma 'tshal lag so//
8b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ gang de bzhin
8b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sangs rgyas zhes pa 'am ston pa 'am/ skya ba'i 'am/
8b6(mdo sde): dpung gnyen zhe 'am gnas shesa'am 'dren pa zhe 'am/ rnam par 'dren pa zhe 'am/
8b7(mdo sde): yongs su 'dren pa zhe 'am/ sman pa zhe 'am/ gso ba zhe 'am/
8b8(mdo sde): lam ston pa zhe'am/ lam brjod pa zhe'am/ gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam pa//
9a1(mdo sde): @sna tshogs brjod pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang /
9a2(mdo sde): bsngags pa dang rab tu bstod pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis 'jig rten mngon par brjod pa'i chos de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das
9a3(mdo sde): bdag ma 'tshal mi rten ma mthong lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis yam brla dang / ngo bo nyid kyis gsob lags
9a4(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna
9a5(mdo sde): bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo sgyur ba zhig sprul par gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal
9a6(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba la gnas pa mtha' yas pa de thams cad lhags shing / bcom ldan 'das de la lus tha dad par yang da gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das de la sems can lus tha dad
9a7(mdo sde): par mthong lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag gis dpung gi tshogs 'di'i bdag po bya zhing / gli
9a8(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyis rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po yang 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di
9b1(mdo sde): ni bdag cag gi gtso bo yin pas/ bdag cag ni de'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags mod kyi/ de dag de'i rjes su 'jug par bgyid par yang gda' lag so//
9b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin du chos de dag gi chos nyid gang lags pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ nyan thos sam/ slob pa 'am mi slob pa 'am/ rang sangs
9b3(mdo sde): rgyas sam/ so so'i skye bo'i ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
9b4(mdo sde): mngon pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rten pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid
9b5(mdo sde): dmigs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyis chos nyid rten pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid rten pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/
9b6(mdo sde): gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ de bzhin du nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/
9b7(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid rten par mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la gzugs stong pa 'am/ 'dis gzug
9b8(mdo sde): stong pa dmigs pa dang / 'di la gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / 'dis rnam par shes pa stong pa
9b9(mdo sde): sa byam sa nyid
10a1(mdo sde): 'am/ 'di la rnam par shes pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs
10a2(mdo sde): ba stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
10a3(mdo sde): stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de la nyan thos ma mchis/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid
10a4(mdo sde): ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo mchis// so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'am/
10a5(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs sprul pa de la 'khor lo sgyur ba ma mchis/ dpung gi tshogs ma mchis lags so// sgyu ma la ma mchis/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid la ma mchis/ sgyu ma mkhan rnams la
10a6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags so// sa la ma mchis/ tshul ma mchis/ med la mchis/ rlung la ma mchis/ nam mkha' la mchis/ rnam par shes pa lam mchis lags so// sa dang nu dang /
10a7(mdo sde): me dang rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams rnams la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra lags ste/
10a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag ni rlom sems su mi bgyid/ de dag las bdag ni byung bar ma gyur/ de dag bdag gis ni ma smras lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag ni
10b1(mdo sde): yon tan gyi chos rnams nyid las dben pa lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams rjes su dran par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags/ de ni
10b2(mdo sde): tshul ma lags te/ lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'am de rjes su thos pa rnams ni 'di snyam du gzhan yang dag par blangs pa la 'jug par bya zhing
10b3(mdo sde): ston pa yang gzhan/ btsal bar bya la/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan smra ba'i don tu gyen tu blta bar bya zhing / tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni/ shes bzhin pas shes mthong bzhin pas
10b4(mdo sde): mthong / yang dag pa'i lta ba yang 'dogs bzhin pas 'dogs par byed do snyam du mi sems lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das gnas pa 'di la ni
10b5(mdo sde): bdag som nyi ma mchis pa thob pas gnas lags so// chos kyi sgo de yang rjes su thob pas gnas lags so// chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste dben pa'i rdul dang / skye
10b6(mdo sde): ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gcig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tsom
10b7(mdo sde): zhu bar 'tshal ba lags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la skabs phye ba lags te/ dbang po'i brag phug nas 'od ma'i tshal 'dir phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan
10b8(mdo sde): 'das bdag 'dir mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan gyi phyed gnang ste/ bdag la gnang ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rab tu 'ur 'ur
11a1(mdo sde): zhing rnam pa drug tu yang rab tu g.yos lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag nyid chen po
11a2(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa'i lta bu dang slob dpon ma mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang / thugs rje chen po'i tshul zhugs zhing //
11a3(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa la bzhugs nas/ bdag la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ngo mtshar lags so snyam ngo mtshar bgyid de/ bcom ldan
11a4(mdo sde): 'das dper bgyid na/ mi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan pa tshogs kyis 'tsho ba zhig tshogs kyis khyim gyi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
11a5(mdo sde): bskur rta dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhin dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / dri bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur la/ mchis
11a6(mdo sde): pa de la des stan gyi phyed stsal na/ de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/ rgyal po la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir bdag song du zin kyang / bdag blta ba 'am
11a7(mdo sde): phyag bya ba yang dka' bar 'gyur na gsol ba lta cing smos/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bkur bas/ bdag phyin ma thag pa lta stan gyi phyin du zin kyang / 'di ni ngo ma
11a8(mdo sde): ro snyam bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rang byung ba/
11b1(mdo sde): slob dpon ma mchis ga nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing rtogs par dkar ba lags na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
11b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tsom zhu ba dang phyag bgyi ba
11b3(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen bskur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag ji ltar ji ltar mchis pa na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa blta
11b4(mdo sde): ba rnyed cing phyag bgyi ba rnyed la/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang zhu ba dang yongs su zhu bar bgyi ba snyed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da ltar bdag 'dir mchis pa la gdan gyi phyed
11b5(mdo sde): gnang ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi dbul po des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang / phyag bgyi
11b6(mdo sde): ba yang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa chen po dang ldan zhing / thugs rje chen po dang /
11b7(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa lags kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang lags pa de dag ston pa ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs
11b8(mdo sde): pa 'di snyam du bdag ni phul ba dang / bdag ni mchog dang / bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o snyam du dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs
12a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
12a2(mdo sde): dang thun mod ljags so snyam bgyid lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legs so legs/
12a3(mdo sde): so// 'od srung khyod yang legs so// 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med cing / dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/ de ni sbyin pa'i chad de lta bu dang / sbyin pa'i pha
12a4(mdo sde): rol du phyin pa'i chad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi bar chad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chad de lta bu dang / smon lam rnams kyi tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam
12a5(mdo sde): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / thabs kyi tshad de lta bu dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ming lta bu dang / spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i pha
12a6(mdo sde): rol du phyin pa'i chad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i nad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
12a7(mdo sde): shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus so// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te de
12a8(mdo sde): dag dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o// gzhi gang zhe na/ rdul khrims mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid
12b1(mdo sde): dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang / 'od srung mi mnyam pa'i ye shes bzhi po de dag ni/ gang dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa/
12b2(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
12b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'jig rten bsam yas na/ sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te/ sems kyi las ni sbyangs pas na// de dag seng ge sgra sgrogs byed// seng ge'i sgra sgrog
12b4(mdo sde): byed pa ni// mu stegs gzhan rnams skags par 'gyur// chos kyi chos nyid thos nas su// g.yang sar rab tu lhung bar 'gyur// bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang //
12b5(mdo sde): sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa// 'od srung de dag bstan 'di la/ mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do// dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas dang // nga'i nga zhes
12b6(mdo sde): brten pa rnams// 'od srung de dag stan 'di la// mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do// gang dag tshul khrims phung po dang // bsam gtan rnams dang thos mang
12b7(mdo sde): gis/ rlom sems rnams mangs de dag ni// 'od srung mu stegs can rnams so// bdag ni chog shes 'od rlung dang / rab tu dben la gnas pa dang /
12b8(mdo sde): chos gos ngan pa 'chang snyam pa// 'od srung de ni mu stegs so// dper na nam mkha' 'di la ni// lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing // dper na nam mkha' rdug
13a1(mdo sde): gyis kyang // nam yang gos par mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'od srung ngas bstan pa'i// chos 'dir gang dag gnas de dag/ nyon mongs
13a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi gos ste/ nam mkha' las rdal dang sprin bzhin no// ji ltar mkha' la mi yis me tog spos rnams dang // de bzhin 'phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 'dir mchod kyang //
13a3(mdo sde): bdag mchod la skyes 'gyur 'jigs par 'gyur ro zhes// de la blo gros kyang ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar nam mkha'i de la gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar de'i rang bzhin gos par/
13a4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar de'i rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis gsog/ de bzhin dge sbyong dag la stong pa'i chos rnams so// ji ltar gang gis nam mkha' bsdigs pa dang // ji ltar nam du yang
13a5(mdo sde): ni ga she bar mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin// de dag nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med chos rnams chos 'dir dge slong gang dag legs par bslabs rnams
13a6(mdo sde): dang / rtagazhan dag slob par 'gyur rnams dang // 'di la nam du'ang gang dag chags par mi 'gyur ba// nga yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslabs rnams su bstan// ji ltar mkha' la
13a7(mdo sde): nam yang lag pa mi mthogs dang // rdul dang dud pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar lam ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur dang // chos la de bzhin mos pa rnams ni dge sbyong
13a8(mdo sde): yin// ji ltar sprin dang bral bar gyur pa'i nam mkha' la// zla ba thogs pa med pas mkha' la 'gro byed kyang // bdag gis bar snang la ni snang bar bya snyam tu// de la rnam ltag de ni 'byung bar mi
13b1(mdo sde): 'gyur bzhin// rgod med bdag nyid dge zla ba lta bu yis// sbyin pa'i bdag po'i khyims rnams su mi 'gro bar bya// rgod me dang rgyal rnam grol sems dang ldan pa dang // 'jig rten chos rnam/
13b2(mdo sde): kyis ni ma gos sems ldan bya/ khyim rnams la ni nga rgyal spangs nas bsten par bya// der phyin nas kyang chos nyid rab tu brjod par bya// bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spangs nas su// /
13b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnam dag tshul khrims can du gnas par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa// 'od srung longs shig longs la rang gi stan la 'dug
13b4(mdo sde): shig 'od srung khyod la chos kyi theg tsom ji snyed yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang // 'od srung ngas dris pa lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas
13b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po sa'i steng de las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
13b6(mdo sde): yang rdza 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams
13b7(mdo sde): cad// rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
13b8(mdo sde): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
14a1(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas par zhugs te/ de dag zhugs nas mtha' yas/
14a2(mdo sde): shing dpag tu med par shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mngon par
14a3(mdo sde): mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po byin dang / tshangs pa dang tshangs chen po dang / 'od gsal dang / mi che dang
14a4(mdo sde): mi gdung dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
14a5(mdo sde): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
14a6(mdo sde): b+h+ya na sa kyis pa dz+wa wA Sh+T+ra// khrul zhe pa dus / sbyi ma kyi dang / mtham pa dang / rnam pa drug nga/ la
14a7(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / rab mdzes dang / e la'i 'dab ma dang / de dag gzhan yang klung bye ba phrag stong sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom
14a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing rgyal po// rgyal chen po'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin
14b1(mdo sde): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyang
14b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka gnas par zhugs nas/ gcig la gcig nyam dra ba med par 'khod par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de
14b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ me'u 'gal gyi bu khyod longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig/ de bzhin
14b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa bsgrub pa'i pa'i
14b5(mdo sde): spyod pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag par mchim pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad chos la yang
14b6(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/
14b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgrub pa
14b8(mdo sde): yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa'i bar du yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo sgrub pa yang dag par ston par
15a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas pa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa yang
15a2(mdo sde): dag par ston par 'gyur/ 'khor bzhi yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
15a3(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'khor kyang yang dag par rim par byed par 'gyur/ 'das pa'i dus lam chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / de bzhin du da ltar dang ma
15a4(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / spyod pa dang smon lam rnams dang / ye shes kyi phyogs tsam zhig yang dag par ston
15a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan 'phang du
15a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten srid TIg bshams so// steng gi bar snang la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chags rin po che sna bdun las pa ka tsi lin de'i gos ltar reg na bde ba srid kyi tshad ni
15a7(mdo sde): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang ldan pa/ rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig byas so// 'chags de la yang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang / rta babs bdun dang / stegs bu
15a8(mdo sde): rim pa bdun dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba sprul te/ 'chags de'i g.yas g.yon su yang 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang /
15b1(mdo sde): khye dUr+ya rin po che sna bzhi sa shing ljon pa dag mngon par sprul to// gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa la dngul gyi lo ma gyi me tog dag dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams
15b2(mdo sde): la/ gser gyi lo ma dag dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i me tog dag dang / shel las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams dang / gser
15b3(mdo sde): gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel las byas pa'i 'bras bu dang / shel las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag
15b4(mdo sde): dang baidu ng+yalas byas pa'i 'bras bu dag mngon par smral to// shing ljon pa bams cad kyi bar dag tu yang yanalas brgyad dang ldan pa'i dus bkang ba'i rdzing brim rnas pa'i dang /
15b5(mdo sde): pa/ them skas de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang / dngul dang bai dur+ya/ shel las byas pa gser gyi phye ma bdal pa/ ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang /
15b6(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa dang / steng gi bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to// 'chags de yang dar gyi lda ldi mang
15b7(mdo sde): spangs pa/ bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa/ mi bdun gyi srid tsam du me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal bkram pa zhig mngon par sprul to// ud pa la dang pad+ma dang / ku
15b8(mdo sde): mu ra dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag la yang me'u gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mngon par sprul to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis byas
16a1(mdo sde): pa'i gdan de lta bu de mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan
16a2(mdo sde): bshams lags na/ de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka'
16a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ me'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis gdan bshams zin tam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan bshams lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' se/
16a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri shos shig/ de bzhin gshegs
16a5(mdo sde): pa de la bzhugs nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dang /
16a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pas nges par ston pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gdan bshams so// gdan de shom pa/ byang
16a7(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis seng ge'i gdan de la/ rang rang gi bla gos dag bting ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di skams du dgos te/
16a8(mdo sde): bdag gis ni 'di lta ste/ the tsom dang nyi gsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dzad pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad pa bsgrub pa dang /
16b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa bsgrub pa dang / smon lam bsgrub pa dang / zhing bkod pa bsgrub pa de/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bsgrub pa gang dag yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
16b2(mdo sde): de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa 'byung ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / byang
16b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / chos bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdog phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs
16b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par mi
16b5(mdo sde): 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos gos dag las mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba nges par mngon
16b6(mdo sde): par 'du bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du gdan de la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas kyang / yul mtha' yas
16b7(mdo sde): pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de nas
16b8(mdo sde): de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rang rang gi bla gos ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bting ngo // de dag gi rang rang gi chos de dag la bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas
17a1(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa nas rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du yang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems
17a2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag yang dag par tshim zhing yid rangs te/ dga' ba dang dad pa la gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sgra mthun pas tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ cho ga spyod pa yon tan gnas
17a3(mdo sde): gyur pa// chos rnams kun la dbang ldan bsnyems mi mnga'// yon tan kun la gnas pa khyod mdzes te// rgyal ba dang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// g.yo dang sgyu ni khyod la yod/
17a4(mdo sde): mi mnga'// nga rgyal rgod dang tshul chos mi mnga' ste// rig dang rnam grol dag gi spyod pa mkhyen// ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod mdzes so// dbang ldan bsnyems
17a5(mdo sde): bral ting 'dzin gnas nas su// rdzu 'phrul mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan// chags med ye shes bstan phyir dbang ldan pa// ma 'ongs dus ni khyod kyis deng bstan to// mig
17a6(mdo sde): yo go 'bang bzhi pa thob snyam bgyid// de ring byang chub la ni ma mchis snyam bgyid// bdud dpung bcas pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid// de ring rig pa rjes su thob snyam bgyid/
17a7(mdo sde): rgyal bas gang gis bdus byas stong gzugs pa'i// bla med mig ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid// chags med ye shes khyod kyi bkar drin la// mig kyang chags pa mchis
17a8(mdo sde): pa yod pa ma lags// rnam par mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing // chos ni gang la'ang zhe 'bras ma mchis te// gang la yid ni zhes 'gras ma mchis pa// de ni
17b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lags so// ji ltar rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyan mchog gis/ khams gsum shes la ma chags 'jug pa bzhin// de dag gis ni gzugs/
17b2(mdo sde): sgo de dag dang // dngos dang dngos med mnyam mtshungs yid dang ldan// yang dag brtson zhing rang gi mig la gnas// gang tshe rgyal ba ting 'dzin der gnas che// de ring
17b3(mdo sde): de dag kun gyis tho ba snyam bgyid// chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob// sgor 'jug yongs su sbyang ba rnam dag pa// rgyal ba'i blo na yong yi nyams mi
17b4(mdo sde): 'gyur// sbyin pa chen po'i rnam smin de 'dra ste// khrims chen yon tan de 'dra lags// shes rab chen po'i yon tan de 'dra ste// sngon chad de dag ni bsten mdzad pa//
17b5(mdo sde): khyod ni gdan bzhugs bsam gtan mdzad pa na// mi'i dbang po phyogs bcur lha nger gyur// rgyal sras thugs kyi sras po 'dus de dag/ gang nas shi 'phos las ni
17b6(mdo sde): ci mchis pa// lha dang klung dang mi min mi 'am ci// kun de ring shes pa de 'jug go// kun tu snang bar gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la// gang gis bskal byed shes pa/
17b7(mdo sde): de bskyed pa// som nyi gcod cing the tsom sel ba yis// mi mchog seng ge bzhin du sgrogs par 'gyur// bdag dang gzhan la phan pa tshol ba na// 'di ltar
17b8(mdo sde): sngon chad sbyin pa rdul khrims bzod brtson gang // sems can kun de 'drar skal ba mnyam// sems can de dag thams cad ma btud par// 'di la sbyin dang
18a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims bzod brtson gang // sems can kun la kun du mkhas pas na// 'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang shes rab mchog/
18a2(mdo sde): des na khyod kyis ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs// pA po de ring gdan la bzhugs pa la// thal mo sbyar nas khyod la zhu lags na// som nyi gcad cing the tsom
18a3(mdo sde): bsal du gsol// deng 'dir chos la kun tu snang thob cing // the tsom bral te snang ba thob gyur pas// sems can gang dag 'byung dang bdag cag la// chos
18a4(mdo sde): kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur// / gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa
18a5(mdo sde): de nyid du// pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzhon nur gyur pa zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa bstan las langs te// bla gos
18a6(mdo sde): drag pa cig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dug go// de ltar 'dug pa de'i se
18a7(mdo sde): la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sgo rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin// rdo rje'i tshig rnam dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsgrub pa na
18a8(mdo sde): tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin// smra ba thams cad la char bcad pa bsgrub pa'i tshigs rnams dang // rims par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang / chos thams cad bsdus pa'i
18b1(mdo sde): tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag phyag rgya'i sgra gang dag bslabs na// chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang / shes pa lam
18b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa nyid rjes thos par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag rigs bsam pa'i chos gang dag dang / 'jug pa bsgrub pa gang dag gis/ go ca bgos pa mngon gyi
18b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i cho gas skye ba la// bsam pa bsgrub pa'i tshogs la dgos par 'gyur snyam mo de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa'i bsam
18b4(mdo sde): pa thugs su nud cing / smon lam dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tsho gas bsgrub pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs so// phyogs gzhir gzigs pa na/
18b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ 'od gzer chen po bzhi byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dong ngo // 'od zer de dag kyang shing ljon pa 'am/ rtsig
18b6(mdo sde): pa 'am ri 'am/ sa 'am bar snang gang du bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog gcig par gyur to// phyogs mAn+t+ram+bas thams cad du yang 'od zer de dag thogs pa med par
18b7(mdo sde): rab tu dong ste/ de ltar stong gsum gyi stong rlan po'i 'jig rten khams na/ 'od de dag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed po de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus dag gser gyi lus lta
18b8(mdo sde): bur shes so// gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung ba de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bdag
19a1(mdo sde): nyid 'dod chags rung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung bas mngon par shes so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
19a2(mdo sde): khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa de dag tu sems can skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal tshab mi bzad pa mchis mthar byin pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dag thos
19a3(mdo sde): cad kyi ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
19a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na las kyi bsgrib pas/ bsgribs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgribs pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed pa
19a5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur te// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi
19a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba cher gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
19a7(mdo sde): med pa dag 'das so// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang dang steng dang / 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ong bar
19a8(mdo sde): de dag phyung nas/ gsungs stsal ba'i sgra mdzad de/ gsungs gtsal pa'i sgra des kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par go bar gyur to// de'i tshe shar phyogs
19b1(mdo sde): su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
19b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
19b3(mdo sde): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa gcig pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
19b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad
19b5(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung bstsal pa'i sgra dang 'od kyi snang ba chen po gda' ba su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dra ba can gyi 'od la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub
19b7(mdo sde): phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khas tshad med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
19b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'jigs 'tshe zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
19b9(mdo sde): rgyalangor bar 'tshang brgya bar 'gyuraro// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
20a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// 'khor der byang chub sems dpa'
20a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la yang dag par
20a3(mdo sde): gzhol ba'i phyag rgya yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo zhu bar 'dod do// dran pa can gyi 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
20a4(mdo sde): go cha bgos pa tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go tso bgos pa dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod do// dra ba can gyi 'od byang chub sems dpa' thos pa yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag
20a5(mdo sde): gi gces spras byed par smra na/ du can gyi 'od gang dag gis de dag mthong nas bkur sti byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ ri mo byed dam/ mchod pa byed dam/ rim gror byed
20a6(mdo sde): pa lta ci smos/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
20a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
20a8(mdo sde): po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de yang blta bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang /
20b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i
20b2(mdo sde): dus la nga bab par shes na/ da song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du yang spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas
20b3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
20b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la lag pa lta bu ud pa la byin te/ dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu ud pa la 'dis
20b5(mdo sde): mchod cig/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/
20b6(mdo sde): bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
20b7(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum
20b8(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der song ste/ sems
21a1(mdo sde): kyi skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
21a2(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi 'od/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la der song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
21a3(mdo sde): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
21a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags so// bde bar gshegs pa pad+ma ga dra ba can gyi 'od lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
21a5(mdo sde): khos phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
21a6(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi 'od khyod yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig/ khyod bde ba dang nad med par gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom
21a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dag nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can
21a8(mdo sde): gyi 'od kyi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/
21b1(mdo sde): nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang /
21b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa cig pa des bcom ldan 'das la lags pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di yang bkur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
21b3(mdo sde): dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la zhes bya gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la bzhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ma pham
21b4(mdo sde): pa la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu ud pa la de thogs nas/ byang chub
21b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' bzang skyong las stsogs pa lnga brgya la smras pa/ rgan rabs dag lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin pa'o// de nas bzang
21b6(mdo sde): skyong las stsogs pa lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das li bdag
21b7(mdo sde): cag de ltar yang dag par bzhugs pa lags na/ ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de dag
21b8(mdo sde): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma
22a1(mdo sde): pham pas bdag cag la phul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di rang gi smon lam gyi stobs/
22a2(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i stobs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i slad
22a3(mdo sde): dulag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de gtor bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs
22a4(mdo sde): te mtsho zhing gzhes pa dag dang / gang dag ma byung ba dag dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byung ba 'am 'jig pa der yang bcom ldan 'das gtong bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du
22a5(mdo sde): lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi
22a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed byang ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang gtong bar bgyi'o// bcom
22a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang su dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ud pa la'i dri snom par gyur cig/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
22a8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang mchi bar gyur cig/ de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de gtor nas de nas de
22b1(mdo sde): tade rdza
22b2(mdo sde): ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pas reg ste/ lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de bcom ldan 'das kyis reg nas de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la/ ud pa la de'i nang nas de/
22b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyed mngon par byung zhing / ud pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyed mngon par byung zhing / ud pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs
22b4(mdo sde): pa'i sku phyed mngon par byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byed pa de dag gis/ gang dag chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mi shes shing mos par mi byed la/ chos thams cad sgrib
22b5(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin zhing / de dag de bzhin
22b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag kyang ma yin no zhes de lta bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/ gsungs nas kyang bzhud do// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to// sgyu ma
22b7(mdo sde): 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste// gzung min thams cad chu zla 'dra ba yin// stong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa chos nyid 'di rgyal bas de 'drar gsungs// mam/
22b8(mdo sde): nyid med chos rnams dag mtshan nyid yin// mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ste// brtag pas stong zhing bdag med chos rnams la// 'jig pa med cing brtsod pa med pa
22b9(mdo sde): 'gyur/ gang dag de ltar chos nyid de 'dod pa// de dag ston pa rgyal ba mthu bo che// phyogs bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la// de 'dra 'di ni de'i byin brlabs so//
25a1(mdo sde): @ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag gis// tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas phyogs bcur bzhud do// de nas bcom ldan
25a2(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji tsam du smon lam dag
25a3(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang / sems can gang dag gi smon lam de dag thos pa dang / ming yang bsgrags pa de dag sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su thar bar/
25a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu/
25a5(mdo sde): de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'byung ba'i cha ma lags so// de'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper gyi na/ skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig rin thang ma mchis/
25a6(mdo sde): pa'i nor bu rin po che dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/ phan pa dang bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che'i yon tan bslabs thos nas/ yongs
25a7(mdo sde): su btsal bar sems shing / nor bu rin po che de'i mtshan ma dag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid la/ chab kun sa 'am de las gzhan mi gtsang ba dang 'dres pa'i byor
25a8(mdo sde): dag na/ nor bu rin po tshe shin tu yongs su byang ba de 'dam du bskul ba mthong zhing lhag par yang nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na srin ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ gdol
25b1(mdo sde): pa'i rigs sam/ yung po'i rigs sam/ de dag las gzhan yang tshegs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag ni nor bu rin po che de'i ming yang
25b2(mdo sde): ma 'tshal na/ yon tan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis logs so// de nas mi des mi gtsang bar stsal ba'i nor bu rin po ni de mthong
25b3(mdo sde): nas/ nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni mdzes pa ma yin no// zhes de skad ces smra bgyid la de nas dma' ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de khyod kyis gang gi bsngags
25b4(mdo sde): ba smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de gang yin zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / mi des nor bu rin po che de bstan la de ston pa na/ mi byis pa'i rang bzhin de dag ma mtshal bzhinas/
25b5(mdo sde): kye mi khyod kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras khyod kyis gang smras pa'i nor bu rin po che'i yon tan de dag ni yod pa ma yin no// khyod ni brdzun du smra ba bzhin du
25b6(mdo sde): smra ba bzhin du smra ba ste/ khyod kyi tshig de dag yid mi ches so zhes smras la/ de'i tshe mi des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas mngon par bteg cing blangs nas mchis
25b7(mdo sde): te/ de nas nor bu rin po che de phyug nas/ mi de mchis ma thag du mi dbul po'i rang bzhin can de dag la cig shin tu rnam par 'khrug par gyur nas/ de'i rjes la gnod
25b8(mdo sde): pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dbul pos blta
27a1(mdo sde): / bar mchis lags te bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i gtsang 'dam gyi snod du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin/
27a2(mdo sde): can gyi mi des de 'tshar ba de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na bdag cag blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde ba thams cad nye bar
27a3(mdo sde): sgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par sbyangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
27a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go ca bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i 'khor yug na dma' bas 'tshe ba dbul po
27a5(mdo sde): dma' ba'i mi de dag gnas pa de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'di na/ de dag las gzhan pas sems can rnams blta bar bgyi'o//
27a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ de dag las gzhan pas sems can rnams blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes pa 'am/ bud
27a7(mdo sde): med kyis nor bu rin po che'i yon tan dag thos nas/ nor bu rin po che de yongs su btsal bar sems shing mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas
27a8(mdo sde): kyang nor bu rin po che de'i snod de mi 'tshams pa ma yin no zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
27b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'tshal ba ma yin no zhes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
27b2(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dgra bsngags pa brjod lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/
27b3(mdo sde): skyes pa 'am bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa de yang mthong nas snod
27b4(mdo sde): de ni 'tshams pa ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
27b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slad du/ bdag cag 'dir
27b6(mdo sde): mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis nas/ bdag gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa brgya phrag du mas bltam zhing sems can dge
27b7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa dag gis bltam par mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ 'dam du tsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de'i 'od de bzhin du/ bcom
27b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha dgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi
28a1(mdo sde): 'dor lags te/ 'dir ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa chung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom/
28a2(mdo sde): gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ mi de nor bu rin po che de yon tan dag sgrogs pa na/ mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin
28a3(mdo sde): can de dag mngon par yid mi ches pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od shin du rgyas pa 'am/ smon lam chen po 'am/
28a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la yang yid ches par mi bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom
28a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che blangs nas mchis la/ de mchis ma thag tu yang sems can de dag gnod pa rnams
28a6(mdo sde): pa du mas shas cher yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
28a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis nas/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsal ba rnams
28a8(mdo sde): gcig la gcig rab tu rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing chos kyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos ma lags pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho nar bas so zhes de
28b1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag ni chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid
28b2(mdo sde): la yang dag par blangs nas gnas par 'gyur la gcig thabs so dang / sun 'byin pa dang / tshangs 'bru ba dang / smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag cig la/
28b3(mdo sde): gcig dge ba'i chos la nyams nas/ sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing / de dag chos stsogs pa dang / dge ba stsogs pa lhar len par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom
28b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo don 'tshal ba/ don yongs su tshol bar 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'tshal ba dang / nyan thos kyi
28b5(mdo sde): thegs spabs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes par mi bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lta mos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
28b6(mdo sde): 'das dper bgyi na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dang / yang dag par sos dang thig nag dang tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / de dag las gzhan pa sems
28b7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po dag du/ sems can gang dag skyes pa de la skad gcig thang cig yud tsam yang bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs gas gcig pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis/ 'jig
29a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mi mjed na/ sems can mnar med par skyes pa rnams dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
29a2(mdo sde): 'dir skyes pa dag la yang dri ba ci yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba gcig pu mchog tu gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de
29a3(mdo sde): na sems can de dag gi rang bzhin gyis bde ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang de mngon par yid ches par dka' bar
29a4(mdo sde): 'byur bar smra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang chos kyi the tsom gcad pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad du gang gi don du bdag 'dir mchis pa/ de
29a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi rtag pa lags pa'i
29a6(mdo sde): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gang la bde ba ma mchis pa dang / sdug bsngal ma mchis
29a7(mdo sde): pa dang / rtag par ma mchis pa dang / mi rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po mi mchis pa dang /
29a8(mdo sde): dngos po ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus byas ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma byas ma mchis pa dang / bdags pa ma mchis pa dang / bdag pa mchis pa ma
29b1(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / 'jig rten pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa mchis pa da/
29b2(mdo sde): bden pa mchis pa dang / brdzun pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub ma mchis pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnam ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / snang ba ma/
29b3(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / mun pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu
29b4(mdo sde): ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / lam ma mchis pa dang / lam ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / mthar thug pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten ma
29b5(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / 'jig rten nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnams de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
29b6(mdo sde): kyi tshogs las yang dag par byung ba/ kun rtog las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang / gzhan thams cad 'jig rten la bstan par bgyi ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs
29b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bstan du mi rung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la stobs rnams ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul ma mchis
29b8(mdo sde): kun brjod pa ma mchis/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis/ rjes su bstan pa ma mchis/ rjes su bstan pa'i chos 'phrul ma mchis lags so// mi 'jig pa rnams mchi/
30a1(mdo sde): shing / stobs rnams mchis la/ bde ba ma mchis shing / sdug bsngal ma mchis lags te/ de dag thams cad ni rlom sems lags
30a2(mdo sde): shing / de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid rjes su thob pa dang / rjes su thob pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi
30a3(mdo sde): ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma lags te 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang rlom sems dang / g.yos pa dang spros pa lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin gshegs pas ni bden pa
30a4(mdo sde): dang / brdzun pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ zag pa dang / bcas pa 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma
30a5(mdo sde): tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims sam/ stobs rnams sam/ stobs ma
30a6(mdo sde): mchis pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa 'am/ sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma lags pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sangs rgyas
30a7(mdo sde): sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ smon lam rnams sam/ byin gyi brlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag
30a8(mdo sde): par bcom zhing lam yongs su mkhyen te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar sing ge lta bu dang / glang po che lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad lagaso//
30b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhad na mi 'thun pa rnams la mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad/ 'thun pa rnams la mthun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad
30b2(mdo sde): 'thun pa rnams la mthun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhad na dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du de gnyis gas kyang btang snyoms
30b3(mdo sde): par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa dag dang / rang byung gi gnas dag dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
30b4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang yang thun mong ma lags pa'i gnas pa dag lags na/ de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad dang / mthun mongs ma lags pa lta smos
30b5(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thun mongs ma lags she na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi de lta bu'i gnas de dag dang / de snyed kyi
30b6(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag dang / yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang / sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / bde ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog cing /
30b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems
30b8(mdo sde): can gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags/
31a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags shes bgyi ba ni spyod pa ma mchis shing rnam par spyod pa ma mchis shing rnam par spyod pa ma mchis/
31a2(mdo sde): pa te/ des na spyod yul ma lags shes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos dag gam/ rang sangs rgyas dag gi spyod pa ma mchis pa'i
31a3(mdo sde): slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de mtha' yas pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnas pa mtha' yas pa lags zhe na/
31a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mos pa ni mtha' yas te/ gang gis kyang 'tshal bar rngo mi thog lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas
31a5(mdo sde): pa de ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags la/ yi ge ni brjod pa kho na lags pas/ de'i slad du bcom
31a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ni rang byung gi gnas lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gnas pa de la rnam par lta bar mi 'gyur zhing / rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can
31a7(mdo sde): de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas shi 'phos pa lags so// gang dag gnas pa de glo bar chud par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ gnod pa chen po dang ldan par
31a8(mdo sde): 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de na/ bcom ldan 'das don gyi sgo dang chos kyi sgo de lags te/ 'khor sgo drug khri stong dang ldan
31b1(mdo sde): pa lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa'i byang chub ni nam mkha' lta bur tshang ma mchis shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
31b2(mdo sde): dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjes su thob pa lags so// sgo'i tshig 'di bstan cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun khri bdun stong gyis ni//
31b3(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjes su thob ste/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de nyid do// de dag thams cad bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob po// bdag
31b4(mdo sde): cag gis deng byang chub thob po zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang smras so// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/
31b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrigs ya phrag
31b6(mdo sde): brgyad ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// dge slong sum stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//
31b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang de nas de ma thag tu de'i tshe/ 'jig rten du 'od chen po
31b8(mdo sde): 'byung bar gyur cing sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
32a1(mdo sde): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
32a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang / 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom
32a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo// byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis sgo de bstan cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri bdun
32a4(mdo sde): stong gis sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thob par gyur cig/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis ske'i tshig bstan pa de ni nam mkha' yongs
32a5(mdo sde): su zin pa'i sa'i phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas brgya stong las blangs te/ blangs nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo nges par
32a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas par gyur pa'i phyir ro// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun
32a7(mdo sde): bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa cig pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
32a8(mdo sde): mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ 'khor 'bum phrag du ma la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyal mtshab/ byang chub sem
32b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug nas/ des gsung bstsal pa'i sgra de thos te/ de bzhin gshegs
32b2(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa de'i 'od de yang mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung stsal pa'i sgra dang 'od
32b3(mdo sde): gdu ba de su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
32b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon de la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
32b5(mdo sde): med pa bdun bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAH
32b6(mdo sde): thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ sems dpa' dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas/ byang chub sems
32b7(mdo sde): dpa'i snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa'i sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// de nas de/
32b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam
33a1(mdo sde): par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /
33a2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / sems dpa' dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag lta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag
33a3(mdo sde): mchi bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
33a4(mdo sde): chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la de bab par shes na/ rigs kyi bu khyod song la sangs rgyas
33a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing der shes bzhin du gnas par yang byos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub
33a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro// nga'i tshig gis gnod pa rlung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/
33a7(mdo sde): stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di yang dul cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
33a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba yang byas nas byang
33b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bdun khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'ongs te/ de 'ongs nas de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na/ me tog gi shing ngam/
33b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i me tog dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to// me tog gi char pa yang bab po// spos kyi char
33b3(mdo sde): pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon// rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas
33b4(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bzung ngo // gdung gyis kyang yongasu gtug
33b5(mdo sde): te/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnod/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//
33b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
33b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon//
33b8(mdo sde): bkur sti byas pa dang / mchod pa dang ri mo byas par gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon sa las langs te/
34a1(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
34a2(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas
34a3(mdo sde): sam zhe bsnyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems
34a4(mdo sde): dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las lag pa
34a5(mdo sde): lta bu'i pad+ma de bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la bka' stsal pa don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ bcom
34a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
34a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de gnod pa chung zhing stobs dang ldan la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la
34a8(mdo sde): gnas lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la lag pa la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de byin no// de byin nas
34b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de blangs nas tshig gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs
34b2(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par gyur cig sems can yongs su smin par gyur cig
34b3(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams la chos bstan pa dang / sems can dge ba'i ma bskyed pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chu du rnams dang /
34b4(mdo sde): dman pa la mos pa rnams la chos bstan pa bka' stsal pa'i slad du zhe na ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di las 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed
34b5(mdo sde): mthong bar 'tshal pa de snyed kyang mthong ba dang / lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di nyid las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen mtha' yas khyu mchog de'i 'jig rten gyi kha
