118a2(mdo sde): sreg bya ba'i don ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
118a3(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
118a4(mdo sde): khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
118a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal mtsha ba rin chen byin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu gdug spos gdugs shes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin
118a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa mtshan gnyis gtsug tor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis 'od
118a7(mdo sde): ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya ba nas btang ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar du mnga' ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab na
118a8(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams sreg pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sum gyi khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes
118a9(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab sred pa gsum zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
118b1(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
118b2(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab mi 'jigs byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba yod de
118b3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam kha'i rigs kyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
118b4(mdo sde): rgyal mtsha ba lag pa can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
118b5(mdo sde): zad mi shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
118b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya
118b7(mdo sde): ba nas btang ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu yongs su spangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de
118b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnga zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab spos rab gtong
119a1(mdo sde): shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu khyu mchog
119a2(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la mi gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
119a3(mdo sde): 'dabs chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
119a4(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtsha ba mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ming
119a5(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin du rab tu shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
119a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab pa ra dza na zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa cig pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa
119a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dpe med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i
119a8(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga
119b1(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba mtshan ma med pa'i mtsha nyid go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga'
119b2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
119b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab shin du yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin
119b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab sgrogs pa zhes
119b5(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi 'phreng ba bkod pa zhes bya ba ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid
119b6(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab legs byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'ang/
119b7(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
119b8(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtsha ba chos kyi 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
120a1(mdo sde): pa spos rab khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mchub
120a2(mdo sde): dpal 'gyur med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu des rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bzla ba tog
120a3(mdo sde): gi 'od gzar zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab ri rab byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
120a4(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
120a5(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab mi khrug pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba
120a6(mdo sde): bod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dud rtsi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab
120a7(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba btsun
120a8(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
120b1(mdo sde): gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das dag
120b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab spyi spos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de
120b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtsha ba mig bzangs
120b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs shes bya ba bzhug
120b5(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab shin du mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chag
120b6(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzangs pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzangs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
120b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab shin du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog ces bya ba yod de/
120b8(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab bde rgyal po zhes
121a1(mdo sde): bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas
121a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab gnas shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang
121a3(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
121a4(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
121a5(mdo sde): pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab yon tan 'byung
121a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lta na sdug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal
121a7(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab yon tan ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi
121a8(mdo sde): khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
121b1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab sbyin mos shes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
121b2(mdo sde): gser gyi dra bas kun tu khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
121b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab sngar 'chums ma yin zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas kun tu khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de
121b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab grong
121b5(mdo sde): khyer sgrogs shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i
121b6(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur byed
121b7(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod do/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu gar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te//
121b8(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab rgyu kar gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba gtang // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig te
121b9(mdo sde): gyi khams namakha'i rigs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
122a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya
122a2(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i rna cha gdug bkor rnam par dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
122a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal bachab bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
122a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba mya ngan med ces bya ba
122a5(mdo sde): btang ngo // nya de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos rigs btsun zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
122a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
122a7(mdo sde): khams shin tu rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de/
122a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab rigs btsun zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
122b1(mdo sde): pa rin chen me tog sna tshogs me tog kun tu rgyas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba rda
122b2(mdo sde): gros mtha' yas shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes
122b3(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab ba lang bdag ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
122b4(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
122b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab 'od byed ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang
122b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog gyi ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
122b7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba rnam par snang ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams/ gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
122b8(mdo sde): rin chen khar pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba
122b9(mdo sde): gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sring po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
123a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ bya chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dag
123a2(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od gzer ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
123a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab byams pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rab gtor zhes bya ba yo/
123a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab
123a5(mdo sde): me tog gis gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa me
123a6(mdo sde): tog gdugs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab gser gdugs shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chagan
123a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bcwa can zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa den yod gos zhes bya ba bcugs te/ 'am zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
123a8(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab log pa'i go cha bags zhes bya ba gtang // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams me tog can zhes bya ba yod ni
123a9(mdo sde): rgyabacom ldan 'das des/
123b1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
123b2(mdo sde): rgyal 'chab skyed byed ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs
123b3(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi
123b4(mdo sde): nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas gtang ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab
123b5(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
123b6(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub seMs dpa' rgyal 'tshab mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ces bya ba
123b7(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
123b8(mdo sde): rgyal 'chab rigs mtha' yas zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur zhes bya
123b9(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba sde zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
124a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
124a2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab 'das pa rnam par gnon ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi kham
124a3(mdo sde): sred med ces bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba kun rnam par 'joms pa ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
124a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab shin du yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/
124a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
124a6(mdo sde): rgyal 'tshab mthong ma thag du nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan shes mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshes
124a7(mdo sde): pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba rnam par bltas pa'i nga
124a8(mdo sde): ro zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya
124b1(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gom po rnam par gnon ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chag
124b2(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
124b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje rnam par gnon ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba
124b4(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
124b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin
124b6(mdo sde): chen mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs mchog ces bya ba gtang ngo //
124b7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs pa med
124b8(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'ang
125a1(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang ngo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
125a2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin du gnon ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par
125a3(mdo sde): dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin can lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
125a4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal 'tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma
125a5(mdo sde): sgron ma zhes ma bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i
125a6(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshon rtsi phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes
125a7(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i
125a8(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
125b1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes
125b2(mdo sde): 'byung gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od gzer ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
125b3(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma gdags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
125b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnga snga sgra zhes bya ba
125b5(mdo sde): gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
125b6(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
125b7(mdo sde): khams phyogs shes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ bya
125b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal chab phyogs snang zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams la zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pas
126a1(mdo sde): la'i dbang po rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thub bo//
126a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
126a3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs
126a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
126a5(mdo sde): rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs she/
126a6(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
126a7(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
126a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ni'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal babang po
126a9(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
126b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
126b2(mdo sde): mi g.yos zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phug pas zhes bya ba gtang ngo //
126b3(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
126b4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba spos dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
126b5(mdo sde): gyi khams spos dpal zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
126b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsrung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
126b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa tsan dan khang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dbang rgyal 'chab dpal sbas zhes
126b8(mdo sde): bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes
127a1(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas shes bya ba
127a2(mdo sde): gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i
127a3(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs mtha' yas nga ro zhes bya ba gtang ngo //
127a4(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhis la chos kyang
127a5(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal byin zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes zhes
127a6(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
127a7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab brjed nga ro zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsdung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag
127a8(mdo sde): na thos mchog ces bya ba yod te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub semami dpa' rgyal chab 'byor pas byin zhes bya gtang ngo //
127b1(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
127b2(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phan 'dod shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos
127b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
127b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
127b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs bsgrogs don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab go cha mtha'
127b6(mdo sde): las shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin du rab gnas shes bya ba bzhug te/
127b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rte
127b8(mdo sde): gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bco
128a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
128a2(mdo sde): pad+ma'i gdugs cig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba bkod zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sos
128a3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i
128a4(mdo sde): rtog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab na mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i
128a5(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang byed ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
128a6(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po dbyangs zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar
128a7(mdo sde): me byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
128a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
128b1(mdo sde): spyan rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig gzangs shes pa gtang ngo // de'i
128b2(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
128b3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab rgyal mtsho zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad tshogs mtha'
128b4(mdo sde): yas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
128b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
128b6(mdo sde): pa phas ma phas pa'i rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab phas ma phas pa zhes bya ba gtang
128b7(mdo sde): dod/ de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
128b8(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos 'das/
129a1(mdo sde): shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
129a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer zhes bya ba yod
129a3(mdo sde): de de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
129a4(mdo sde): sems dpal rgyal 'tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
129a5(mdo sde): lhun po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin du rab gnas shes
129a6(mdo sde): bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba
129a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab rdul bas byin zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang
129a8(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
129b1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes pa zhes bya
129b2(mdo sde): ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
129b3(mdo sde): rgyal 'tshab mdzes pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
129b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes
129b5(mdo sde): bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de// ng+ge bzhin gshegs pa thog pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhug
129b6(mdo sde): ti/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba dbang pos byin zhes byang ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
129b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyu
129b8(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab yon tan byin zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi
130a1(mdo sde): khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
130a2(mdo sde): te dan bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bstsags zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna
130a3(mdo sde): tshogs zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
130a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'dab chags na/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyu ba smon lam mtha' yas shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
130a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs
130a6(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab lhun po'i rnam dag ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
130a7(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces bya ba yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sbas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
130a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
130b1(mdo sde): khang pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
130b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab ye shes rnam par sems shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos shes bya ba yod de/
130b3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
130b4(mdo sde): 'tshab ye shes 'byung shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar
130b5(mdo sde): me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab phyogasu rnam par grags pa
130b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba
130b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang
130b8(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas
131a1(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
131a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
131a3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab dri ma med pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha
131a4(mdo sde): yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
131a5(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba gtang ngo // tri yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga'
131a6(mdo sde): bzhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ bco
131a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab dpal ba zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs shes bya ba yod
131a8(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes lha kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
131a9(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang
131b1(mdo sde): rgyal tshab rtag du brtsams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba gtang ngo // 'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
131b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i 'od gzer pad+ma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
131b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal po zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/
131b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces
131b5(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bltas/ pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge
131b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos shes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang chen po
131b7(mdo sde): de mthong ste/ gsung stsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// thong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang gsung stsal ba'i sku 'di sus
131b8(mdo sde): lags de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
132a1(mdo sde): khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byung
132a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu 'di ni de'i yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i
132a3(mdo sde): byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
132a4(mdo sde): ba de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom
132a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i
132a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis/ pad+ma brgyad blangs 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la tha de logs su gtor ro//
132a7(mdo sde): de nas pad+ma de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la
132a8(mdo sde): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par mkhod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor gyi 'khor gyis de
132b1(mdo sde): dag mthong nas kyang / ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom
132b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas pad+ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas/ reg pa tsam gyis pad+ma de dag las kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung dag mngon par byung ngo //
132b3(mdo sde): byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to// bam po brgyad pa//
132b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas mkhyen mkhyen mnga' gang zag khyu mchog gtso// rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thugasu chud// khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen gda'// 'jig
132b5(mdo sde): rten khams kun tu snang bar mdzad// de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas// zhu ba'i khyad par kun tu zhu ba dang // sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyid slad du//
132b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi mchis// byang chub go cha bgos pa'o gang mchis dag/ mi 'jed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa// de dag skye ba cig
132b7(mdo sde): gis thogs pa te/ de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags// de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jigs shing // sems can sman pa'i slad du yang dag bzhug
132b8(mdo sde): byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg 'gyur ba// 'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhu// ji slad mngon du chos tshol bgyid ce na// bdud rnams bcom dang byang chub
133a1(mdo sde): 'thob slad du// de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams// gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs// 'dren pas yang rlig gis de bstan nas/
133a2(mdo sde): mi mchog de'i tshig rnams thos gyur te// dga' zhing mgu la rjes su yi rang nas// bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur// sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas/
133a3(mdo sde): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhu ba// de dag gang nas mchis shing ming ci zhes// de tshe 'khor kyang spu rnams zi zhes byed// 'khor rnams bzhi po'i de dag gus pa
133a4(mdo sde): yis// rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spo ste// de tshe 'jig rten mgon po'i sprul pa sprul// de tshe dge slong kun dga' bza' bo byung // mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang /
133a5(mdo sde): zhus nas kyang ni mi gang 'am mthong gyur// de dag su lags de dag su'i lags// mgon po gshad cing the tsom bstsal du gsol// smon lam dpal po ldan pa'i
133a6(mdo sde): go cha ltos// de'i byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te// shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig rten khams kyi tshul// grangs med dag nas de dag lhags pa yin// dpa' bo
133a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags pa// rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa te// bsam pa dag pas byang chub phyir spyod pa// de'i smon lam de ni 'dra'o// de dag dge bas
133a8(mdo sde): nges par sangs rgyas mthong // de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lug/ tshul khrims kyang dman par mi 'gyur te/ zos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags// de dag thab
133b1(mdo sde): shes pa la shin tu bslabs// mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs su// de dag chos kyi sems brgyud brjed mi 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas
133b2(mdo sde): rnams dang mngon du 'phrad// rtag tu 'phags pa rnams 'grogs par 'gyur// dpa'o de yis sems can 'dir mthong rnams// rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob// mthong
133b3(mdo sde): ma thag du dge bas de 'dra ste// gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mnga'// dpa' bo de'i yon tan gang yod pa// mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med// dpa'o//
133b4(mdo sde): shin tu gnas pa de'i ming // de'i tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa// de na phyin chad bud med dngos mi 'gyur// sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyuraro// skyes pa bud
133b5(mdo sde): med gang gis mi thos shing // thos nas de la'ang dga' ba bskyed byed pa// sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa// lus zhig nas ni der yang skye ba 'gyur//
133b6(mdo sde): zhing du yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin// skyes pa bud mod 'on te gzhan yang rung // gang gis ming thos nas zhig dang byed pa// thams cad byang chub ched las
133b7(mdo sde): nyam mi 'gyur// gang dag gtsor bu sems can ma gtogs par// thos nas su zhig dga' bar skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yongs ma gsungs//
133b8(mdo sde): 'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur// gang dag bsam pas ming thos pa ni// ji ltar ci yis skyon rnams sel byed bzhin// sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ga
134a1(mdo sde): byang chub don du nges 'gyur the tsom med// gang zhing pa la sha'i 'dab thogs shing // de dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na// de'i tshe kun
134a2(mdo sde): nas sman gyi stobs kyis su// sus kyang der ni mi la tshig mi 'gyur// gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis// dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te/
134a3(mdo sde): sa'i steng na kun tu ston byed na// de 'dra'i sman bsgos pas ni ci zhig bya// sbrul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa// sbrul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dug byed 'gyur/
134a4(mdo sde): de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de na// ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na// dpa' bo de'i ming ni su'i thos pa/
134a5(mdo sde): de'i ming gis las ni 'di byed de// bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur// gang gis mthong dang sti stang byed ming smos// de na rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa// kun
134a6(mdo sde): dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des// rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba// byang chub zhugs pa su ma tshig de la zhus// kun dga' bzang po go chad dpa' bo'i
134a7(mdo sde): ming // 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan pa// rgyal ba'i byang chub
134a8(mdo sde): yid ces bka' yi// sems can dge ba bcu dang ldan pa lhags// de ltar de'i tshe ni chubazang nas// kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog yod de// de ring kho
134b1(mdo sde): nar 'khor du lhags par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i// go cha sngags pa'i phyogs bcur bzlog mi nus// kun dga' bzang po
134b2(mdo sde): rin chen 'byung gnas dang // dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang // yon tan sbas dang mkhas pa de bzhin du// dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin
134b3(mdo sde): de la ltos// chu zhes bya ba dang ni chu lha dang // bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rnams// ji ltar skyob gyur dge slong de dag ltos// de dag rnams kyi go cha
134b4(mdo sde): de bsam yas// don yod ces ni yongasu bsgrags gyur pa// de dag gis mthong ba'ang don yod 'gyur yin na// de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos/
134b5(mdo sde): kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong // gang dag su yis ni ming yang thos gyur pa// de dag nam yang byang chub thogs pa med// de dag nam du'ang log par
134b6(mdo sde): ltung mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin// de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par 'gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de gartag nas/
134b7(mdo sde): thams cad theg mchog la de ltar 'dun// kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yin// 'jig rten da ltar gang dag su gnas pa// dpa' bo de'i go cha
134b8(mdo sde): 'dod gyur pa// de la rgyal ba kun gyi bsngags par brjod// gang gis bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag yang // byang chub sems dpa' de tshe der shes te// shA
135a1(mdo sde): khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang // byang chub zhugs pa'i dpal po de dag blta'o// de'i thos kyang gsol ba btab gyur pa// mtshon po
135a2(mdo sde): mi 'jed 'jig rten khams su mchi// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhags// dge slong de dag gi yang
135a3(mdo sde): ming thos nas// de'i tshe byang chub mchog du 'dun pa bskyed// gang dag ming dang 'dun pas byang chub zhugs// de dag rgyal bas byang chub der lung bstan/
135a4(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med dag du las byas shing // mi dge bsgrubs pa gang dag su yod pa// de'i phyir snyigs ma'i dus na de dag ni// nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas
135a5(mdo sde): zhing du lhags// nga yi byang chub mchog 'di thos gyur kyang // de tshe sems can blta bar spro ba med// gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams byung ba// nub dang gtum
135a6(mdo sde): dang shin du rnam pa yin// de tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thos nas su// yang dang yang du brtson 'grus stobs skyed cing // mu go'i dus su rjen rjen sbyin pa byin// de dag rnams
135a7(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa zlum pa yin// de dag 'di las gus pa che byas nas// phyis dus 'jigs pa chen po de'i tshe// srog kyang gtang nas ni bya snyam ste// ba'i chos mchog sdes
135a8(mdo sde): zhing 'dzin par byed// dus de na ni mi dge'i las rnams kyi// smon lam gnas kyang 'jig rten dag yod// 'di na las de dag ni byas pas na// de'i tshe na
135b1(mdo sde): brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur// de dag der na 'di 'dra'i chos thos nas// de tshe der ni chos min 'du shes 'gyur// chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes// 'jig
135b2(mdo sde): rten phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos// de tshe dge slong pas kyang dus byed pa la// rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas// de'i tshe mgo la me 'bar bzhin du rtogs//
135b3(mdo sde): 'chi med thob par bya phyir ma lu bstsal// bstan 'dir bu rnam par 'jig thos na// der ni ltar yang dug sngags dag tu 'gyur// de tshe 'jigs mthong na mi rung zhes//
135b4(mdo sde): de lta'i dus su shi yang bla snyam sems// bag tsha med pa'i sgrogs bsgrags pa'i phyir// drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong // 'dren pa mchog gi zhal du lta byed
135b5(mdo sde): cing / dkye ma rgyal bas bshad ces yi rangs so// dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong // dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi mkhas gyur pa// 'di ni ting
135b6(mdo sde): 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin// de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong // sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur// de tshe tshul ldan shin tu char bcad 'gyur//
135b7(mdo sde): gnas khang gnas pa tshegs kyis thogs gyur zhing // de tshe lha yin shin du mi dga' 'gyur// kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig/ gang gi don du de tshe dka'
135b8(mdo sde): spyod pa// de dag dge slong sdig pas tshar bcad 'gyur// bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la ltos// 'dir ni phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur// des pa
135b9(mdo sde): rnams la de dag bsngags min brjod// sangs rgyas la 'khrug long byed pa dag/ de dag khyim na gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur// baidage bsnyen ma dang 'dre bar byed
136a1(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing // de na de dag la lag pa cig tu byed// rgyal ba'i rten la ma gus gyur nas su// byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par 'gyur// dkon
136a2(mdo sde): mchog gsum la mchog tu 'tshe gyur te// de dag rtag tu nges pa rnams kyi spangs// khyu mchog rab chags gyur ma rungs pa// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pas spong /
136a3(mdo sde): de tshe tshul khrims ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing // de tshe dge slong sdig pa sa bskas tshul 'gyur// 'jigs chen phyi ci log gis dus su ni// skyo ba thob byos bag kyang
136a4(mdo sde): yod par gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la brtson 'grus skyed// de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i dge slong rnams dang 'phrad ma byed/
136a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe ni sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos 'di lta
136a6(mdo sde): ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am// brkyang ba bskum par byed pa'i skad cig des// de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
136a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir 'ongs te// de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi
136a8(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ma nyung ngam/ bskyod yang ngam/
136b1(mdo sde): stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la su kun tu ston pa'i khyu mchog spun gsol lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
136b2(mdo sde): stsal pa// rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de spun mi mnga' ma/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// 'jig
136b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
136b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na//
136b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
136b6(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab mtshan nyid cig pas mchog ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
136b7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
136b8(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal tshab
136b9(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
137a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs rtsegs shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes
137a2(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
137a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshe
137a4(mdo sde): pa ye shes me tog 'byung ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab sa 'dzin
137a5(mdo sde): rab gnas shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' rnam par dag ces bya yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
137a6(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab rin chen
137a7(mdo sde): gdugs shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de den de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba zhes
137a8(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab ut+pal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang
137b1(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
137b2(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems pa med ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
137b3(mdo sde): rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
137b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan
137b5(mdo sde): 'byung gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bam gyi mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
137b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes
137b7(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
137b8(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal 'tshab rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnod byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
138a1(mdo sde): mi 'jigs par gshegs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
138a2(mdo sde): 'tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la dmar pos khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa spos
138a3(mdo sde): kyi rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchos lhun po zhes bya ba
138a4(mdo sde): gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te/
138a5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab rtul ba mtha' yas shes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
138a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'dra
138a7(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rtul 'dra ba rnam par gnon ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs shing 'jig su rung bas mi 'dzig
138a8(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa bsnyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sos
138b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal 'tshab phyogasu rab grags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla
138b2(mdo sde): bA zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'gro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
138b3(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa med sgron med bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
138b4(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyis khams 'od byed ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin
138b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab rnam par bsgrub
138b6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gyen du shes bya ba
138b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab kyi mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dag
138b8(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu rin po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
139a1(mdo sde): kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
139a2(mdo sde): gyi khams rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
139a3(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod de/
139a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
139a5(mdo sde): rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stob
139a6(mdo sde): kyis rnam par bgrags shes bya ba bzhug te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags
139a7(mdo sde): shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/
139a8(mdo sde): 'tshe ning gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
139b1(mdo sde): khams skye reng zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
139b2(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab ded dpon zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
139b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal
139b4(mdo sde): ba'i sde zhes bya ba btong ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya
139b5(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de yang 'dab
139b6(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
139b7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal
139b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang /
140a1(mdo sde): chub ses dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba'i dpal
140a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa med tog sna tshogs shes bya ba zhugs ste 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang nub sem
140a3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes brtson 'grus zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
140a4(mdo sde): pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde byed ces bya
140a5(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shi 'phos med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya
140a6(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba me tog spos bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
140a7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dbang mgom po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
140a8(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshab rtag tu slob zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
140b1(mdo sde): khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
140b2(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab snying rje chen po'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
140b3(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
140b4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom 'angs des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'drab chags na/ 'jig
140b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
140b6(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces
140b7(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer mtha' yas shes bya ba ste/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
140b8(mdo sde): rgyal tshab sems tshad med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
141a1(mdo sde): spyan mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
141a2(mdo sde): chab mig po chen zhes bya ba gdang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi
141a3(mdo sde): khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo //
141a4(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba
141a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba
141a6(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu skar gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya/
141a7(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal che ba pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i
141a8(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra ba khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
141b1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
141b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
141b3(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad+ma zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
141b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig
141b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags
141b6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig ces bya ba gtang ngo //
141b7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan ces bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
141b8(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten khams rgyu skar
142a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon du 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
142a2(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal chab sna tshogs
142a3(mdo sde): shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ brtse zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
142a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya ma'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin
142a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis
142a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'jigs pa shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams can dan spros shes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid
142a7(mdo sde): gnyis pa'i rtog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes bya ba
142a8(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' bzang po zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po
142b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
142b2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba 'byung zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gan
142b3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
142b4(mdo sde): gyi khams rnam par bgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bgrags pa'i snyoms kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes
142b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khas
142b6(mdo sde): yon ten zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
142b7(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bsgoms shes bya ba
142b8(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen med zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzheg la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
143a1(mdo sde): rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis mnan ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs
143a2(mdo sde): pa yid gnyis thams cad yang dag 'joms 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi
143a3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa zhes bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rim pa'i sras zhes bya ba bzhugs
143a4(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba gtang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
143a5(mdo sde): gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
143a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gshes gnyen bces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
143a7(mdo sde): ba pad+ma'i dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab ye shes rab mchog ces bya
143a8(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab gtang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
143b1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams cad gshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
143b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams sprin chen zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
143b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal chab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma snang ba'i
143b4(mdo sde): 'od gzer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
143b5(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
143b6(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'phags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i gnas
143b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
143b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal chab bshes gnyen grags ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
144a1(mdo sde): pa rgya 'tsho'i lhun po mngon tu 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'/
144a2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
144a3(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo //
144a4(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
144a5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab dpa' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi las
144a6(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
144a7(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin du rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rab brjod ces
144a8(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
144b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zas kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs
144b2(mdo sde): pa tha dad pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med
144b3(mdo sde): pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan bsdung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer mtha' yas
144b4(mdo sde): shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo //
144b5(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhi
144b6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na rin chen zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
144b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de la sogs pa skye ba cig gi thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom
144b8(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' shig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
145a1(mdo sde): @de'i tshe lho phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhug
145a2(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ nga'i 'og du 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes/
145a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgyu skar gyi 'brang ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
145a4(mdo sde): rgyu skar gyi 'breng bas snang ba chen po de mthong ba ste/ gsung bstsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das des zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsung stsal ba'i sgra
145a5(mdo sde): grags pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba 'di nas byang phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das
145a6(mdo sde): ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
145a7(mdo sde): kyi chos kyang ston to// 'khor der yang chos nyan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go ma bgos pa dag 'dus te rgyu gar gyi
145a8(mdo sde): baphreng ba 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na ni/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bu'i go cha dag gis go cha de lta bu dag gis stongs so// de nas bcom ldan
145a9(mdo sde): kyikyi rnam grangs kyi chos
145b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi 'phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
145b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyi
145b3(mdo sde): mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu des
145b4(mdo sde): dus la dbab par shes par song shig/ nga'i tshig gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes spun gsol la/ rigs kyi bu
